subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Pacers unloaded two starters, Stephen Jackson and Al Harrington, to achieve equilibrium on and off the court. In return, the Pacers received the high-priced backup forwards Troy Murphy and Mike Dunleavy.
snippet: The Pacers unloaded two starters, Stephen Jackson and Al Harrington, to achieve equilibrium on and off the court. In return, the Pacers received the high-priced backup forwards Troy Murphy and Mike Dunleavy.
